scripts.start:services: cd services/ && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.development.yml up -d --build
scripts.start:services:appmap: cd services/ && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.development.yml -f docker-compose.development-appmap.yml up -d --build
scripts.install:services: cd services/ && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml build
scripts.code:all: code ./ && npx npm-run-all --npm-path npm --parallel code:121-service code:portal
scripts.test:all: npx npm-run-all --npm-path npm --print-label --parallel test:prettier test:portal test:services
scripts.test:121-service: cd services/ && docker compose exec 121-service npm test
